RunType.title: RunType
RunType.description:
Type of running activity.

Enum members descriptions:

- TREADMILL: Running on a treadmill.
- OUTDOOR: Running outdoors on roads or paths.
- TRAIL: Running on trails.

RatePerceivedExertion.title: RatePerceivedExertion
RatePerceivedExertion.description:
A quantitative measure of perceived exertion during physical activity. Follows the Borg CR10 scale.

Enum members descriptions:

- 0: No exertion.
- 0.5: Noticeable.
- 1: Very light.
- 2: Light.
- 3: Moderate.
- 4: Somewhat difficult.
- 5: Difficult.
- 6: Difficult.
- 7: Very difficult.
- 8: Very difficult.
- 9: Almost maximal.
- 10: Maximal.

WeatherCondition.title: WeatherCondition
WeatherCondition.description:
General weather condition.

Enum members descriptions:

- SUNNY: undefined
- CLOUDY: undefined
- RAINY: undefined
- SNOWY: undefined

content.description: The binary content of the file, in base64.

title: Run
description: Represents a single running activity performed by the user.

startTime.description:
ISO 8601 timestamp of when the run started.

Format `dev.superego:String.Instant`:

An exact point in time in the ISO8601 format, in "Zulu time", with millisecond precision.

durationSeconds.description: Total duration of the run in seconds.

distanceMeters.description: Total distance of the run in meters.

averagePaceMinPerKm.description: Average pace in minutes per kilometer.

mapSnapshot.description: An image file of the route map.

isRace.description: Indicates if the run was part of a race.

notes.description: User's personal notes about the run.
